Radio Deprogramming

A workshop that was presented through the Wave Farm Radio Artist Fellowship in February 2022 and culminated (for now) in 53 collaboratively authored and recorded media-deprogramming prompts.

  • What is the nature of the programming that radio programmers do?
  • What does it mean for a medium, like radio, to be programmable?
  • What can we do when it feels like media want to program us?
  • What could it mean to deprogram radio?
Meeting 路 Listening 路 Reading 路 Contributing 路 Deprogramming
